subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: JaJuan Johnson made two free throws with 2.2 seconds left and No. 19 Purdue overcame a 14-point second-half deficit to defeat host Northwestern, 63-61, on Thursday night.
snippet: JaJuan Johnson made two free throws with 2.2 seconds left and No. 19 Purdue overcame a 14-point second-half deficit to defeat host Northwestern, 63-61, on Thursday night.
